page.title: 17DYKE AREA LOCAL RECIPES
page.content: Here are some local dishes past and present. {Pot-roast rabbit.}Half grown rabbit jointed and roasted in an iron pot in butter and flour,quickly browned,then cooked slowly in hot hob. {Tattie Drottle}Sliced potatoes and onions sweated in butter and milk and seasoning added until absolutely smooth.cream is added before serving and it is eaten with oatcakes. {Fish-milk soup}White fish trimmings used as a stock bases, add several potatoes, milk and parsley. {Potted Chicken}Made by mincing the remains of cooked chicken and stirring this into the stained and seasoned stock produced from boiling the carcase and bones. {Skirley}Heat fat to smoking hot in a large frying pan. Add seasoned oatmeal and chopped onion and stir.
